description: Wedgwood lists this stop with the following description: LIEBLICH GESCHALLT - (Ger.) Schallen = to echo. 8 ft. Invented by Mr. Hope-Jones. A very small scaled Echo Lieblichgedeckt. CC, 2 1/2 in.; mid. C, 7/8 in. Parkgate School, Cheshire (Hope-Jones). Kinnoul Church, Perth, N.B. Audsley adds: �a small-scaled metal Lieblichgedeckt, 8 ft., voiced to yield a very soft tone ... Otherwise of no special interest.�
